connector.description: Send message to an AWS SQS FIFO Queue.

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.queueNam.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.queueNameOrArn
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.queueNam.description: The SQS Queue name or ARN

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.accessKe.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.accessKey
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.accessKe.description: The access key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.secretKe.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.secretKey
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.secretKe.description: The secret key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.contentB.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.contentBasedDeduplication
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.contentB.description: Use content-based deduplication (should be enabled in the SQS FIFO queue first)

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.autoCrea.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.autoCreateQueue
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.autoCrea.description: Setting the autocreation of the SQS queue.

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.amazonAW.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.amazonAWSHost
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.amazonAW.description: The hostname of the Amazon AWS cloud.

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.protocol.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.protocol
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.protocol.description: The underlying protocol used to communicate with SQS Example: http or https

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.useDefau.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.useDefaultCredentialsProvider
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.useDefau.description: Set whether the SQS client should expect to load credentials through a default credentials provider or to expect static credentials to be passed in.

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.useProfi.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.useProfileCredentialsProvider
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.useProfi.description: Set whether the SQS client should expect to load credentials through a profile credentials provider.

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.useSessi.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.useSessionCredentials
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.useSessi.description: Set whether the SQS client should expect to use Session Credentials. This is useful in situation in which the user needs to assume a IAM role for doing operations in SQS.

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.profileC.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.profileCredentialsName
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.profileC.description: If using a profile credentials provider this parameter will set the profile name.

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.sessionT.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.sessionToken
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.sessionT.description: Amazon AWS Session Token used when the user needs to assume a IAM role.

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.uriEndpo.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.uriEndpointOverride
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.uriEndpo.description: The overriding endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also select the `overrideEndpoint` option.

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.override.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.overrideEndpoint
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-fifo-sink.override.description: Select this option to override the endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also provide a URI for the `uriEndpointOverride` option.
